Articles.Content:
Hello everybody!

I'm new to forums and sort-of new to KSP. I found out about KSP from Nerd Cubeds videos, and fell in love with Scott Manleys. I've managed some of the basic stuff, and want to take part in the community, and hopefully learn a thing or two to help me on my own travels.

If perhaps anyone involved in the making of this game is reading this; A big thank you and an internet hug, and I'll be buying a t-shirt once I have 30 dollars to my name.
Another Procrastinator, eh? Welcome to the KSP Forums! And KSP as well! Yay! But don't let Brad Kerman fly your ship *wink
